page.title: 12COMMON INSECTS OF FARR
page.content:
The most bother some insects in this part of Scotland are the{midgies.}They fly about in the evening and give you little bites.After a while these begin to itch.Once these have stopped itching they begin to get quite sore.
Another insect is the{ladybird.}The adult ladybird clings on to your finger if you pick it up,but baby ladybirds just tickle you.
The{honey bee}can make honey out of honey suckle,heather,roses and all sorts of flowers.One of my mum's friends have lots of bees and another has ten hives in her apiary.
This year lots of{earwigs}have come into Strathnairn homes because it has been alot wetter than usual.
